Comments: I have severe low BP which cycles up and down during the day. W/O Midodrine I basically cannot function in society and am housebound. With the drug I can at least get through an 8 hr workday so I can make a living. I wish they had longer lasting Midodrine. The effectiveness of each 10 MG dose is about 4 - 5 hours. It takes about 45 minutes to "kick in" and when the effectiveness wears off_ it wears off very_ very quickly (minutes).
